mapper.select: SELECT J1.*,C.* FROM (SELECT A.*,B.* FROM (SELECT `LTE-R_IMEI` ,`LTE-R_IMSI` ,`LTE-R_SERIAL` ,`LTE-R_USER_ID` ,`LTE-R_MAC_ADD` ,`LTE-R_IP` ,`LTE-R_SIM_NO` ,`CON_SYSTEM01_IP` ,`CON_SYSTEM01` ,`CON_SYSTEM02_IP` ,`CON_SYSTEM02` ,`CON_SYSTEM03_IP` ,`CON_SYSTEM03` ,`CON_GW` ,`LTE-R_USED` ,`INS_LOC_TXT` ,`LTE-R_CODE` ,`LTE-R_DEVICE_TYPE` ,`SW_VER_CODE` ,`TEAM_CNT` ,`DEVICE_CNT` ,`LTE-R_CELL_ID` ,`RMT_RESET_YDT` ,`RMT_RESET_RLT` ,`RMT_UPT_YDT` ,`RMT_UPT_RLT` ,`GET_DEVICE_INFO_YDT` ,`SW_VER_UPDATE` ,`OBS_COUNT` ,`USE_YN` , DATE_FORMAT(REG_YDT ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_YDT ,`INTERVAL_TIME` ,`LTE-R_BAND` ,`LTE-R_CHANNEL` ,`LTE-R_MCC` ,`LTE-R_MNC` FROM tbl_router_info WHERE `LTE-R_IP`=#{lteRIp} ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DEPART_CODE ,DEPART_NAME ,CPY_NAME ,CPY_CODE ,HQ_NAME ,HQ_CODE ,TEAM_NAME ,TEAM_CODE ,REG_YDT AS DEPART_DATE FROM tbl_depart_info )B ON(SUBSTR(A.`LTE-R_CODE`,1,11)=B.DEPART_CODE) ORDER BY A.REG_YDT )J1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT `LTE-R_BAND` ,`LTE-R_CHANNEL` ,`LTE-R_CELL_ID` ,`LTE-R_MCC` ,`LTE-R_MNC` ,`LTE-R_RSSI_VAL` ,`LTE-R_RSRP_VAL` ,`LTE-R_RSRQ_VAL` ,`LTE-R_IMEI` ,`LTE-R_IMSI` ,`LTE-R_SERIAL` ,`LTE-R_IP` ,`LTE-R_MAC_ADD` ,`LTE-R_SIM_NO` ,`CON_SYSTEM01_IP` ,`CON_SYSTEM02_IP` ,`CON_SYSTEM03_IP` ,`LTE-R_OPERATION_TM` ,`MEM_CRIT_VAL` ,`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL` ,`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL` ,`LTE-R_DEVICE_TYPE` ,`SW_VER_CODE` ,`OBS_CODE` , DATE_FORMAT(`RECEIVE_TIME` ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `RECEIVE_TIME` , DATE_FORMAT(`UPDATE_TIME` ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS `UPDATE_TIME` ,`NOW_STATUS` ,`TEST_YN` ,`COMMAND` ,`PCI` FROM tbl_last_data WHERE `LTE-R_IP`=#{lteRIp} ORDER BY RECEIVE_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 )C ON(J1.`LTE-R_IP`=C.`LTE-R_IP`) ORDER BY J1.REG_YDT DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(RECEIVE_TIME ,'%Y-%m-%d') AS RECEIVE_TIME
,CASE WHEN INSTR(`SW_VER_CODE`, '700P')!=0 THEN ROUND((`MEM_CRIT_VAL` * 100)/128000,3) ELSE ROUND((`MEM_CRIT_VAL` * 100)/32000,3) END AS `MEM_CRIT_VAL` ,ROUND(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`*0.1,3) as `LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL` ,ROUND(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`*0.1,3) as `LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`
FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT RECEIVE_TIME , `LTE-R_IP` , `LTE-R_MAC_ADD` , `SW_VER_CODE`
,CASE WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'B')=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','') ELSE CASE WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'GB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','') *1000000,3) WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'MB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','') *1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'KB') !=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','') WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'B') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000,3) ELSE 0 END END as `MEM_CRIT_VAL`
,CASE WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'B')=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','') ELSE CASE WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'GB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','') *1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'MB') !=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','') WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'KB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'B') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000000,3) ELSE 0 END END as `LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`
,CASE WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'B')=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','') ELSE CASE WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'GB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','') *1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'MB') !=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','') WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'KB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'B') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000000,3) ELSE 0 END END as `LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`
FROM tbl_receive_data WHERE 1=1 AND `LTE-R_IP`=#{lteRIp} AND RECEIVE_TIME >= NOW()-INTERVAL 210 SECOND UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS RECEIVE_TIME,0 AS `LTE-R_IP`,0 AS `LTE-R_MAC_ADD`,0 AS `SW_VER_CODE`,0 AS `MEM_CRIT_VAL`,0 AS `LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,0 AS `LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL` FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS RECEIVE_TIME,0 AS `LTE-R_IP`,0 AS `LTE-R_MAC_ADD`,0 AS `SW_VER_CODE`,0 AS `MEM_CRIT_VAL`,0 AS `LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,0 AS `LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL` FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS RECEIVE_TIME,0 AS `LTE-R_IP`,0 AS `LTE-R_MAC_ADD`,0 AS `SW_VER_CODE`,0 AS `MEM_CRIT_VAL`,0 AS `LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,0 AS `LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL` FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS RECEIVE_TIME,0 AS `LTE-R_IP`,0 AS `LTE-R_MAC_ADD`,0 AS `SW_VER_CODE`,0 AS `MEM_CRIT_VAL`,0 AS `LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,0 AS `LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL` FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS RECEIVE_TIME,0 AS `LTE-R_IP`,0 AS `LTE-R_MAC_ADD`,0 AS `SW_VER_CODE`,0 AS `MEM_CRIT_VAL`,0 AS `LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,0 AS `LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL` FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS RECEIVE_TIME,0 AS `LTE-R_IP`,0 AS `LTE-R_MAC_ADD`,0 AS `SW_VER_CODE`,0 AS `MEM_CRIT_VAL`,0 AS `LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,0 AS `LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL` FROM DUAL
)A WHERE 1=1 and( A.RECEIVE_TIME!=0 OR ROWNUM () <= 6 ) )B ORDER BY B.RECEIVE_TIME ASC LIMIT 6

SELECT A.`LTE-R_IP` ,A.`LTE-R_MAC_ADD` ,A.`LTE-R_USED` ,A.`INS_LOC_TXT` ,DATE_FORMAT(B.RECEIVE_TIME ,'%Y-%m-%d') AS RECEIVE_TIME
,CASE WHEN INSTR(`SW_VER_CODE`, '700P')!=0 THEN ROUND((IFNULL(B.`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,0) * 100)/128000,3) ELSE ROUND((IFNULL(B.`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,0) * 100)/32000,3) END AS `MEM_CRIT_VAL` ,ROUND(IFNULL(B.`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,0)*0.1,3) as `LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL` ,ROUND(IFNULL(B.`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,0)*0.1,3) as `LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`
,B.`CON_SYSTEM01_IP` ,B.`CON_SYSTEM02_IP` ,B.`SW_VER_CODE` ,IFNULL(B.`LTE-R_RSRP_VAL`,0) AS `LTE-R_RSRP_VAL` ,IFNULL(B.`LTE-R_RSRQ_VAL`,0) AS `LTE-R_RSRQ_VAL` ,B.`LTE-R_IMEI` ,B.`LTE-R_IMSI` ,B.`LTE-R_MNC` ,B.`LTE-R_MCC` ,B.`LTE-R_BAND` ,B.`LTE-R_CHANNEL` FROM ( SELECT `LTE-R_IP`,`LTE-R_MAC_ADD`,`LTE-R_USED`,INS_LOC_TXT FROM TBL_ROUTER_INFO WHERE `LTE-R_IP`=#{lteRIp} )A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT `LTE-R_IP` AS `LTE-R_IP2` ,RECEIVE_TIME ,CASE WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'B')=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','') ELSE CASE WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'GB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','') *1000000,3) WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'MB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','') *1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'KB') !=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','') WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'B') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000,3) ELSE 0 END END as `MEM_CRIT_VAL`
,CASE WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'B')=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','') ELSE CASE WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'GB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','') *1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'MB') !=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','') WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'KB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'B') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000000,3) ELSE 0 END END as `LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`
,CASE WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'B')=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','') ELSE CASE WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'GB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','') *1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'MB') !=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','') WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'KB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'B') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000000,3) ELSE 0 END END as `LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`
,`CON_SYSTEM01_IP` ,`CON_SYSTEM02_IP` ,`SW_VER_CODE` ,`LTE-R_RSRP_VAL` ,`LTE-R_RSRQ_VAL` ,`LTE-R_IMEI` ,`LTE-R_IMSI` ,`LTE-R_MNC` ,`LTE-R_MCC` ,`LTE-R_BAND` ,`LTE-R_CHANNEL`
FROM TBL_LAST_DATA WHERE `LTE-R_IP`=#{lteRIp} AND RECEIVE_TIME > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MINUTE ORDER BY RECEIVE_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 )B ON(A.`LTE-R_IP`=B.`LTE-R_IP2`)

WITH RAN AS ( SELECT * FROM tbl_rssi_strength ) SELECT B.KEY_VAL,COUNT(B.KEY_VAL) AS cnt FROM ( SELECT T1.*,T2.* FROM (SELECT `LTE-R_IP`,`LTE-R_MAC_ADD`,`LTE-R_CODE`,SUBSTR(`LTE-R_CODE`,9,3) AS lteCode FROM tbl_router_info) T1 LEFT JOIN tbl_depart_info T2 ON SUBSTR(T1.`LTE-R_CODE`,1,11)=T2.DEPART_CODE )A LEFT JOIN (SELECT `LTE-R_IP` AS K1,`LTE-R_MAC_ADD` AS K2, CASE WHEN `LTE-R_RSSI_VAL` > RAN.EXCELLENT_VAL THEN 'EXCELLENT' WHEN `LTE-R_RSSI_VAL` > RAN.GOOD_VAL THEN 'GOOD' WHEN `LTE-R_RSSI_VAL` > RAN.MEDIUM_VAL THEN 'MIDDLE' ELSE 'WEAK' END AS KEY_VAL FROM tbl_last_data,RAN)B ON A.`LTE-R_IP`=B.K1
WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEPART_CODE=#{departCode}
GROUP BY b.key_val HAVING KEY_VAL IS NOT NULL

SELECT J1.TEAM_CODE, J1.TEAM_NAME ,ROUND(AVG(J1.`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`),0) AS `LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL` ,ROUND(AVG(J1.`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`),0) AS `LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL` ,J1.REG_YDT FROM ( SELECT A.* ,B.* FROM ( SELECT T1.*,T2.* FROM (SELECT `LTE-R_IP`,`LTE-R_MAC_ADD`,`LTE-R_CODE`,SUBSTR(`LTE-R_CODE`,9,3) AS lteCode FROM tbl_router_info) T1 LEFT JOIN tbl_depart_info T2 ON SUBSTR(T1.`LTE-R_CODE`,1,11)=T2.DEPART_CODE )A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT `LTE-R_IP` AS K1,`LTE-R_MAC_ADD` AS K2
,CASE WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'B')=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','') ELSE CASE WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'GB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','') *1000000,3) WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'MB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','') *1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'KB') !=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','') WHEN INSTR(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`, 'B') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`MEM_CRIT_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000,3) ELSE 0 END END as `MEM_CRIT_VAL`
,CASE WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'B')=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','') ELSE CASE WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'GB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','') *1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'MB') !=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','') WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'KB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`, 'B') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000000,3) ELSE 0 END END as `LTE-R_COM_UP_VAL`
,CASE WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'B')=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','') ELSE CASE WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'GB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','') *1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'MB') !=0 THEN REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','') WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'KB') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000,3) WHEN INSTR(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`, 'B') !=0 THEN ROUND(REGEXP_REPLACE(`LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`,'[a-z]','')/1000000,3) ELSE 0 END END as `LTE-R_COM_DN_VAL`
FROM tbl_last_data )B ON A.`LTE-R_IP`=B.K1 WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEPART_CODE=#{departCode}
)J1 GROUP BY J1.lteCode ORDER BY J1.REG_YDT
SELECT A.*, NOW() as GET_DEVICE_INFO_YDT FROM tbl_last_data A WHERE A.`LTE-R_IP`=#{lteRIp} ORDER BY RECEIVE_TIME DESC LIMIT 1
